data.title: Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
data.text:
Lance Henriksen (born May 5, 1940) is an American actor and artist.[1] He works mostly in action, science fiction, horror and thriller movies. Henriksen has appeared in over 200 movies.[2] He played astronaut Walter Schirra in The Right Stuff and Murphy in Dog Day Afternoon.[3] Henriksen was born in New York City.[1]
